title: Journeys
description: From a football fanatic, to a fairy with a quirky career, Dick and Dom present some of the top 50 stories from the BBC Radio 2 Breakfast Show 500 Words competition 2018
itunes:subtitle: Written for kids, by kids: thrilling tales of travels and trips!
